text: One Touch of Nature is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithOne Touch of NatureRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars Arthur V. Johnson, Florence Lawrence, and Marion Leonard. ==Actors== * Arthur V. Johnson as John Murray * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. John Murray * Marion Leonard as Sicilian Woman * Charles Inslee as Sicilian Woman's Accomplice * Harry Solter as Doctor * Linda Arvidson as Nurse * Kate Bruce * Adele DeGarde * Gladys Egan ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: One Touch of Nature (1909 movie)
